Skin.Name: 睡衣
Skin.Introduction: 拟人化的猫蓝（Anthropomorphic Feline Blue）

Skin.Name: 燕尾服
Skin.Introduction: "Some events ask for white tie, and some ask for black tie. Well, this is red tie."

Skin.Name: 短裙
Skin.Introduction: "Everybody needs a little black dress. (Conveniently, it hides ash stains.)"

Skin.Name: 派对礼服
Skin.Introduction: "A cute party dress with puffed sleeves."

Skin.Name: Formal Body Shell
Skin.Introduction: "But of course it has a cummerbund."

Skin.Name: 舞会礼服
Skin.Introduction: "Be the life of the party in this gray silk ball gown."

Skin.Name: 加拿大夹克
Skin.Introduction: "A real Canadian Jacket, made for real Canadians. (Not out of real Canadians.)"

Skin.Name: 晚礼服
Skin.Introduction: "A fancy flowing shirt with formal trousers."

Skin.Name: 引人注目的礼服
Skin.Introduction: "The delightful aroma of mothballs and decay wafts off it."

Skin.Name: 女武神甲
Skin.Introduction: "Be a knight in shining armor. Or at least look like one. (It's just a costume, not real armor.)"

Skin.Name: 正装夹克
Skin.Introduction: "A black blazer with a red scarf."

Skin.Name: 皱巴巴的衣服
Skin.Introduction: "This outfit may have been attacked by weevils. Or something worse."

Skin.Name: 褴褛的碎布
Skin.Introduction: "These clothes aren't good for anything except fueling a fire."

Skin.Name: 打补丁的紧身衣
Skin.Introduction: "Wearing fur makes you feel like mighty animal!"

Skin.Name: 破布裙
Skin.Introduction: "This skirt has had a close brush with the forces of darkness."

Skin.Name: 破旧的身体
Skin.Introduction: "It may have seen better days, but this body is still minimally functional."

Skin.Name: 破烂的标签
Skin.Introduction: "Living outdoors may be healthy, but it's sure hard on your clothing."

Skin.Name: 肮脏的齿轮
Skin.Introduction: "Trees are great, but clothing doesn't grow on them."

Skin.Name: 破旧的衣服
Skin.Introduction: "If these clothes could talk just imagine the stories they would tell."

Skin.Name: 磨损的优雅服饰
Skin.Introduction: "A tragic end to a once-dapper three piece suit."

Skin.Name: 撕裂的服装
Skin.Introduction: "This costume looks a little the worse for wear, but the performance must go on."

Skin.Name: 缠着绷带的身体
Skin.Introduction: "Spiderwebs are pretty useful for bandaging scrapes."

Skin.Name: 暗影西装
Skin.Introduction: "A suit made of shadows. Quite the opposite of flashy."

Skin.Name: 暗影裙
Skin.Introduction: "This dress flickers as if it were on fire... If that fire were made of shadows."

Skin.Name: 暗影连衣裤
Skin.Introduction: "These clothes put hair on your chest."

Skin.Name: 暗影连衣裙
Skin.Introduction: "Finally the darkness envelops you, as you always knew it would."

Skin.Name: 暗影底盘
Skin.Introduction: "A dark automaton chassis with a lovely decorative gemstone.

Skin.Name: 暗影长袍
Skin.Introduction: "This dress is made from many shadow fragments sewn together."

Skin.Name: 暗影Feller的衣服
Skin.Introduction: "Clothes for leaping from tree to tree and eating buttered scones."

Skin.Name: 反暗影西装
Skin.Introduction: "This look hearkens back to a simpler time. You are missed, Charlie."

Skin.Name: 暗影甲
Skin.Introduction: "Dark armor. It looks nice, but unfortunately shadows have no substance."

Skin.Name: 暗影蜘蛛体
Skin.Introduction: "The hollowed out body of an elegant black widow."

Skin.Name: Letterman夹克
Skin.Introduction: "Run from ghosts and eat copious amounts in style in this slick Letterman Jacket!"在PAX期间访问Klei Booth获得。

Skin.Name: 漂亮毛衣
Skin.Introduction: "Donning this Smart Sweater impels the wearer to burgeon a broad, patrician lexicon."在PAX期间访问Klei Booth获得。

Skin.Name: 礼服手套
Skin.Introduction: "These gloves will hide the chemical stains on your hands when you dress up for formal occasions."

Skin.Name: 引人注目的手套
Skin.Introduction: "White gloved hands are sometimes a symbol of deception. They're also a symbol of fashion!"

Skin.Name: 玛丽简女鞋
Skin.Introduction: "Hit the jackpot with these classic 'pure white' colored Mary Janes."

Skin.Name: 舞鞋
Skin.Introduction: "Dress to the nines in these 'pure white' colored shoes."

Skin.Name: 马靴
Skin.Introduction: "A pair of 'pure white' colored riding boots. Yee-haw!"

Skin.Name: 加拿大靴
Skin.Introduction: "Infused with maple syrup and essence of moose. This pair is a tasteful 'werebeaver brown' color."

Skin.Name: 钢趾靴
Skin.Introduction: "These 'insufficient chocolate brown' colored boots will protect you from stubbing your toes, but not a whole lot else."

Skin.Name: 钢趾靴
Skin.Introduction: "These 'muddy shoes tan' colored boots will protect you from stubbing your toes, but not a whole lot else."

Skin.Name: 凉鞋
Skin.Introduction: "A pair of 'catcoon blue' colored sandals, with socks (for extra fashion)."

Skin.Name: 兔子拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: "Show those bunnies what's what by wearing this pair of fuzzy 'snail mucus purple' colored bunny slippers."

Skin.Name: 绒毛拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: "Warm, fuzzy, 'anthropomorphic feline blue' colored slippers. A spot of cheer in a hostile world."

Skin.Name: 威尔森 - 尊贵的客人
薇洛 - 尊贵的客人
Skin.Introduction: "Willow prefers events that include bonfires or fireworks."

Skin.Name: 沃尔夫冈 - 尊贵的客人
Skin.Introduction: "Wolfgang enjoys formal dinners: the food is usually excellent."

Skin.Name: 温蒂 - 尊贵的客人
Skin.Introduction: "Wendy is not cheered by party games."

Skin.Name: 薇克巴顿 - 尊贵的客人
Skin.Introduction: "Since Wickerbottom doesn't sleep, she can dance all night."

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 尊贵的客人
Skin.Introduction: "Woodie puts bear fat in his hair when he goes out."

Skin.Name: 麦斯威尔 - 尊贵的客人
Skin.Introduction: "Against all possible odds Maxwell has become even more dapper."

Skin.Name: 薇格弗德 - 尊贵的客人
威尔森 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: "As a scientist, Wilson is well equipped to investigate the natural world."

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: "Willow is taming the wilderness with fire."

Skin.Name: 沃尔夫冈 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: "In the wilderness, only the mighty survive."

Skin.Name: 温蒂 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: "Wendy is actually pretty good at surviving."

Skin.Name: 薇克巴顿 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: "Those with knowledge are good at making do in difficult circumstances."

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: "Woodie looks like he's turning into a tree."

Skin.Name: 韦斯 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: "Even mimes can fight if confronted with a monster."

Skin.Name: 薇格弗德 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: "A warrior cannot eat until she defeats some meat."

Skin.Name: 韦伯 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: "Webber looks a little worse for the wear."

Skin.Name: 威尔森 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: "Wilson has learned the science of shadows."

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: "Willow enjoys flickering flames of inky blackness."

Skin.Name: 温蒂 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: "Wendy has always been comfortable with darkness."

Skin.Name: WX-78 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: "This robot was evil before. Now they're double evil."

Skin.Name: 薇克巴顿 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: "A librarian knows how to watch from the shadows."

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: "The shadow realm is pretty much the same as here, just darker."

Skin.Name: 韦斯 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: "The sun is too bright. It blots out the darkness."

Skin.Name: 薇格弗德 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: "Go to the dark side and be on top of the world."

Skin.Name: 破旧的背包
Skin.Introduction: 将背包放在地上一定时间即可

Skin.Name: 便便袋
Skin.Introduction: "A bag shaped like feces. Obviously it was designed by somebody who enjoys sophomoric humor."

Skin.Name: 蝙蝠背包
Skin.Introduction: "Behold, a batty black bat-shaped backpack. Bat."

Skin.Name: 野牛背包
Skin.Introduction: "A backpack made in the shape of a little beefalo. It's so cute and fluffy!"

Skin.Name: 浣熊背包
Skin.Introduction: "Squirrel away your items with this catcoon-shaped carryall."

Skin.Name: 蜻蜓龙挎包
Skin.Introduction: "Dragon flier burning bright, in the desert quite a sight. What equipment is required to quench thy fearsome scorching fires?"

Skin.Name: 兔子背包
Skin.Introduction: "Go down the rabbit hole with this rabbit-shaped backpack."

Skin.Name: 小高脚鸟包
Skin.Introduction: "This smallbird won't ever grow up and reject you like a real smallbird would."

Skin.Name: 蜘蛛袋
Skin.Introduction: "Wearing this backpack will let you make an arachnophobe's day a little bit worse. Or, you could ask yourself 'What would Willow do?' and burn it! Burn it with fire!"

Skin.Name: 带刺的桂冠
Skin.Introduction: 花环 "Laurels ought rest on you, not the other way around."

Skin.Name: 软草帽
Skin.Introduction: 草帽 "Be like a little British lady in your garden!"

Skin.Name: 圆顶礼帽
Skin.Introduction: 高礼帽 "Demonstrate your impeccable style with this dapper bowler hat."

Skin.Name: 黄蜂长矛
Skin.Introduction: 长矛 "It doesn't hit harder than a regular spear, although it certainly still stings."

Skin.Name: 饱经风霜的火炬
Skin.Introduction: 火炬 "Give your torch some visual flare with these hastily wrapped, desiccated rags. Smoky!"

Skin.Name: 悲剧火炬
Skin.Introduction: 火炬 "At first glance this torch appears menacing, but holding it makes you feel quite sad."解密游戏获得。

Skin.Name: 古代手杖
Skin.Introduction: 步行手杖 "To tread ancient paths, long forgotten."解密游戏获得。

Skin.Name: 被子
Skin.Introduction: 毛皮铺盖 "Nothing says "bedtime" quite like a bunch of little fabric squares sewn into one bigger, 'houndbone white' fabric square."

Skin.Name: 被子
Skin.Introduction: 毛皮铺盖 "Nothing says "bedtime" quite like a bunch of little fabric squares sewn into one bigger, 'high elevation blue' fabric square."

Skin.Name: 尖牙篝火
Skin.Introduction: 篝火 "Thish firepit ish made of rocksh that reshemble fangsh. What would it shay if it could shpeak?"

Skin.Name: 无底洞篝火
Skin.Introduction: 篝火 "Bottomless pits are the best. But bottomless pits filled with fire are even better."参加DST早期阶段获得。

Skin.Name: 纪念碑篝火
Skin.Introduction: 篝火 ""A firepit modeled after an ancient, giant monument. Luckily, this version is sized more appropriately for humans (and human-sized entities)."RoG在DST版本中的补偿。

Skin.Name: 手提袋储物箱
Skin.Introduction: 储物箱 "This bag made from luxurious carpet is the height of modern fashion!"

Skin.Name: 宝箱
Skin.Introduction: 储物箱 "A chest worthy of storing your finest gems and treasures. Or, y'know, twigs and manure."

Skin.Name: 火车箱
Skin.Introduction: 储物箱 "Organize your foraged scraps in class and style."

Skin.Name: 旅行箱
Skin.Introduction: 储物箱 "Its travelling days may be over, but it'll always have the memories."

Skin.Name: 古代国王的储物箱
Skin.Introduction: 储物箱 "The history of an ancient people is locked away inside."解密游戏获得。

Skin.Name: 朴素茶几
Skin.Introduction: 茶几 "A table that would be a truly elegant addition to any unkempt wilderness base."

Skin.Name: 蜻蜓龙茶几
Skin.Introduction: 茶几 "An endtable inspired by the most opulent of bloodthirsty monsters."

Skin.Name: 古董茶几
Skin.Introduction: 茶几 "A quaint decorative table that would make your grandmother proud."

Skin.Name: 野营烹饪锅
Skin.Introduction: 烹饪锅 "This cooking pot looks kind of beaten up, but the food it cooks still tastes delicious."

Skin.Name: "Wyvernling"寄生虫
Skin.Introduction: 寄生虫 "This pet's doofy lil dragon face inspires both fear and wuv."

Skin.Name: 髯龙咕噜姆
Skin.Introduction: 咕噜姆 "A pet as noble as he is huggable."
